item.title: What do you think about this
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

This upcoming game looks action packed and full of puzzles, fights and glorious weapons and moves. I will purchase this game for my Xbox 360 when it is released.
